column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Dropped in for some dessert and they did not disappoint. Their dulce de leche eclair was light
column2: creamy and had the right amount of sugar. Their brownie was dense and chocolaty and we got another dessert as well that was really good but I can't remember the name. The only reason they weren't 5 stars for me was because of how close the tables were set.
